registration.title: User registration
registration.description_enabled: Enable this feature to allow the system to freely accept new user registrations without restrictions.
registration.description_disabled: Disable this feature to restrict new registrations, allowing only pre-approved users.

agent_registration.title: Agent registration
agent_registration.description_enabled: Enable this feature to allow the system to freely accept new agent registrations without restrictions.
agent_registration.description_disabled: Disable this feature to restrict new agent registrations, allowing only pre-approved agents.

merchant_registration.title: Merchant registration
merchant_registration.description_enabled: Enable this feature to allow the system to freely accept new merchant registrations without restrictions.
merchant_registration.description_disabled: Disable this feature to restrict new merchant registrations, allowing only pre-approved merchants.

agent_verification.title: Agent Verification
agent_verification.description_enabled: Enable this feature to require new agents to complete verification before they can access their accounts.
agent_verification.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow new agents can access their accounts without requiring verification.

merchant_verification.title: Merchant Verification
merchant_verification.description_enabled: Enable this feature to require new merchants to complete verification before they can access their accounts.
merchant_verification.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow new merchants can access their accounts without requiring verification.

sn.title: Sms notification
sn.description_enabled: Enable this feature to send SMS notifications for system updates and alerts.
sn.description_disabled: Disable this feature to completely prevent any sms notifications from being sent by the system.

en.title: Email notification
en.description_enabled: Enable this feature to send email notifications for important events and updates.
en.description_disabled: Disable this feature to completely prevent any email notifications from being sent by the system.

pn.title: Push notification
pn.description_enabled: Enable this feature to send push notifications for important updates and alerts.
pn.description_disabled: Disable this feature to completely prevent any push notifications from being sent by the system.

force_ssl.title: Force SSL
force_ssl.description_enabled: Enable this feature to secure all user communications with encryption for privacy.
force_ssl.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow users to access the platform without requiring secure connections.

agree.title: Agree policy
agree.description_enabled: Enable this feature to require users to actively agree to the platform policies during the sign-up process.
agree.description_disabled: Disable this feature to skip policy agreement during the registration process.

ev.title: Email verification
ev.description_enabled: Enable this feature to require users to complete email verification before they can access the system.
ev.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow users to access the system without the need to verify their email addresses.

sv.title: Mobile verification
sv.description_enabled: Enable this feature to require users to verify their mobile number in order to gain access to the system.
sv.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow users to access the system without the need to verify their mobile number.

kv.title: User Kyc verification
kv.description_enabled: Enable this feature to require users to complete KYC verification before they can access the system some features.
kv.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow users to access the system some features without the need to verify their KYC Documents.

agent_kv.title: Agent KYC Verification
agent_kv.description_enabled: Enable this feature to require agents to complete KYC verification before they can access certain features of the system.
agent_kv.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow agents to access certain features without needing to verify their KYC documents.

merchant_kv.title: Merchant KYC Verification
merchant_kv.description_enabled: Enable this feature to require merchants to complete KYC verification before they can access specific features of the system.
merchant_kv.description_disabled: Disable this feature to allow merchants to access specific features without needing to verify their KYC documents.

multi_language.title: Language option
multi_language.description_enabled: Enable this feature to allow users to easily switch between different  languages according to their preferences.
multi_language.description_disabled: Disable this feature to remove all language switching options for users within the application.

otp_verification.title: Otp verification
otp_verification.description_enabled: Enable OTP verification via email or SMS for key transactions. Configure in general settings.
otp_verification.description_disabled: Disable OTP verification via email or SMS for key transaction. Manage in general settings.

qrcode_login.title: QR Code Login
qrcode_login.description_enabled: Enable QR code login to offer users, agents, and merchants a fast and seamless authentication experience.
qrcode_login.description_disabled: Disable to turn off QR code login and require traditional login methods instead.
